name: Elementary OS
description: The thoughtfully designed Linux distribution. Elementary OS combines macOS-like aesthetics with Linux power.
longDescription: Elementary OS is a beautifully designed Linux distribution that proves open source software can be just as polished as proprietary alternatives. Inspired by macOS, it features a dock, global menu bar, and consistent visual design throughout. The curated AppCenter offers apps designed specifically for Elementary, ensuring a cohesive experience. If design matters to you, Elementary OS delivers.

seo.title: OmniSet for Elementary OS | Beautiful Linux Setup
seo.description: Set up Elementary OS with OmniSet. The most beautiful Linux distribution meets the easiest configuration tool. Perfect for design-conscious users.
